title: Thursday Post Show (3-25-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (3-25-21)
description:
Bobby talks to Amy about how Karen Fairchild from Little Big Town came over to her house yesterday. Bobby on going to play basketball with Travis Denning yesterday for a video shoot. Amy on her dad moving into her house yesterday and figuring out how it’s going to work. Raymundo finally gets new Post Show music. Bobby brings in our boss Rod to talk about how he thought The Morning Corny wasn’t a good segment. Bobby also gets Rod to tell us about where we are doing well and where we aren’t doing as well.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby talks to Amy about how Karen Fairchild from Little Big Town came over to her house yesterday. Bobby on going to play basketball with Travis Denning yesterday for a video shoot. Amy on her dad moving into her house yesterday and figuring out how it’s going to work. Raymundo finally gets new Post Show music. Bobby brings in our boss Rod to talk about how he thought The Morning Corny wasn’t a good segment. Bobby also gets Rod to tell us about where we are doing well and where we aren’t doing as well.
